STATE v. EDWARDS No. COA06-12 Court of Appeal of North Carolina Filed January 2, 2007 Certification Date January 22, 2007 Appeal from Buncombe (02CRS52454, 04CRS7945, 04CRS7946, 04CRS7947, 04CRS7948, 04CRS7949, 04CRS7950, 04CRS7951, 04CRS7952, 04CRS7953).
